channel.title: Why cant i get mopar scape server 127.0.0.1 to work?
channel.description: i have been trying to get this server 127.0.0.1 to work but its messed up, and same with cursepk.no-ip.org, it says that there is no response from server please try a different world. whats this mean? and how come 127.0.0.1 wont work wen i use it? whats wrong?[br][size=1]Posted on: May 20, 2007, 08:51:33 PM[/size][hr]please :(

item.title: Why cant i get mopar scape server 127.0.0.1 to work?
item.dc:creator: @R34p3d R34p3d
item.description:
@R34p3d wrote:

Ok well firstly, 127.0.0.1 Is HybridScape, Which is a blank base of a server. So no need to use 127.0.0.1 unless you are running your own server.

Read full topic

item.title: Why cant i get mopar scape server 127.0.0.1 to work?
item.dc:creator: @frugoo_scape frugoo scape
item.description:
@frugoo_scape wrote:

127.0.0.1 is a local ip. Thats your computer. You can type localhost also. It is the same thing as 127.0.0.1.
